text: The Guardian is a newspaper, established in 1983, published in Lagos, Nigeria. It is often known as a pioneer in introducing investigative journalism and editorial content to Nigeria. == History == The Guardian was established in 1983 by Alex Ibru and Stanley Macebuh. It has influence from The Guardian in the UK. The paper was first published on 22 February 1983 as a weekly, appearing on Sundays. It started publishing every day on 4 July 1983. ==References== Category:1983 establishments Category:Newspapers published in Nigeria
title: The Guardian (Nigeria)
